title: BE SPECIFIC: Episode 4 - Finn McKenty on Media Sponsorships and how they work
itunes:title: BE SPECIFIC: Episode 4 - Finn McKenty on Media Sponsorships and how they work
description:
BE SPECIFIC - EPISODE 4: Media partnerships? How the hell do they work? My good friend Finn McKenty who is head of marketing at URM Academy and runs the great YouTube channel called PunkRockMBA dives deep with me on this. He speaks specifically about his work with Alternative Press while he was at a company called Creative Live and worked with their award show. We get super nerdy but I hope you enjoy!  Dive into YouTube Music and their new app, it’s the BEST place to stream all of your favorite music and discovering your new favorite bands. Start trading stocks now with Robinhood! Get a free stock when you sign up today! Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
